title: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, eggs, butter, milk
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add eggs and milk. Mix well. Bake at 350F for 30 minutes.

title: Caesar Salad
ingredients: romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, Caesar dressing
instructions: Toss lettuce. Add croutons and cheese. Drizzle dressing and mix.

title: Apple Pie
ingredients: apples, flour, sugar, butter, cinnamon, pie crust
instructions: Place apples in crust. Sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon. Cover and bake at 375F for 45 minutes.

title: Pasta Carbonara
ingredients: pasta, eggs, pancetta, parmesan, black pepper
instructions: Cook pasta. Fry pancetta. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine everything.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter bread slices. Place cheese between slices. Grill until golden brown.

title: Chicken Curry
ingredients: chicken, onion, garlic, ginger, tomatoes, spices, oil
instructions: Saut√© onion, garlic, ginger. Add chicken and spices. Cook with tomatoes until tender.

title: Veggie Stir Fry
ingredients: broccoli, bell pepper, carrots, soy sauce, garlic, oil
instructions: Chop veggies. Stir-fry in oil with garlic and soy sauce until tender.

title: French Toast
ingredients: bread, eggs, milk, sugar, cinnamon, butter
instructions: Mix eggs, milk, sugar. Dip bread. Fry with butter until golden.

title: Paneer Butter Masala
instructions: Cook tomatoes with spices. Blend to puree. Add paneer and cream. Simmer.

title: Pancakes
ingredients: flour, eggs, milk, sugar, baking powder, butter
instructions: Mix ingredients. Pour batter on pan. Cook both sides until golden.
